title: network shares
extract: Network sharing is a feature that allows resources to be shared over a network, be they files, documents, folders, media, etc. ... By connecting a device to a network, other users/devices in the network can share and exchange information through this network. Network sharing is also known as shared resources.
extract_html: Network sharing is a feature that allows resources to be shared over a network, be they files, documents, folders, media, etc. ... By connecting a device to a network, other users/devices in the network can share and exchange information through this network. Network sharing is also known as shared resources.
